name: Nss Post Role Permision
author: nssTheme

sections.installation:
Please follow this Steps:

  1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/plugin-name’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • This plugin is upto date.
    Release Date – 06 sept 2016
sections.description:
This plugins many feature, If you went to use it. Firstly create a custom user that have default permission setting of post, page, custom post and comment, This custom user only insert, read, and show every post, pages.
Finally create a custom post, If you went to show, any where page or template. I hope that, This plugins help to you.

Descriptions

This Plugin is uesd to any body who is create a new user to access to read and insert post, pages and custom post. It will be custom post in you page, or a Template page.

Cool Features:
*Just put short-code in your page or a Template. (short-code is: show_new_role)
*custom role permission, access only read, insert
*Show custom post which is role is activated.

Inserted a new title, content with image and category.
